name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sakana, NYU, waitwhat, dropkickpikachu, heatbag)

name: zem
text: it's pretty obvious from the way he drinks whiskey (pounding it until his stomach reaches capacity)

name: sagoon
text: "Heh, Classic Lyle"

text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Jesler729, waitwhat, goocifer, mortshire, Connellingus, equinn2006, rhymesforkids, Howard, NDCaesar, DrSkradley, thedudeabides85, idsyen, Slab64, stormagnet, peterjoel, Panserbjorne)

name: semiquaver
text: Man lamed for homophobia what douches these lamers are.  You are clearly not a homophobic dogg based on what I have seen of you.  Have a gay stamp of approval.

name: zapatos
text: a... mushroom stamp?

name: untilyouaresonude
text: The funny thing is, Lyle doesn't slow himself or anything. Two other characters get suckered into loving this fake blacksmith, Lyle seeks to make the guy hate life.

name: zefiel
text: That's simply who Lyle is.

name: bookofsand
text: A comment left by bookofsand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kenthegod, waitwhat, Howard)

name: tellumo
text: peperoni and chease

name: plummet
text: hee hee!  oh, hee hee!

name: cpnglxynchos
text: this is what me and my friends wrote on our tombstones. oh we were truly the Limit. hats off to us for that spectacular joke.

name: vreeeee
text: Lyle is not above a little same-sex flirtation if it means he can get his drink on.  Gotta feed the monkey, man.

name: vreeeee
text: A comment left by vreeeee was marked as spam and excluded. vreeeee: What a douche. (reported by jstegall, mortshire, Zem)

name: leon_sumbitches
text: I especially love the fact that he has been doing that for hours. I would have pissed myself laughing by the time I got to that point!

name: ttagxamm
text: What makes you think Lyle hasn't?

name: snowman
text: Lyle pissed himself breathing .

name: dougthehead
text: As the alt text says, Lyle and Hiram are playing different games.  Based on the next comic, I'm not sure why the programmer wrote this part into his module.  Maybe his first meeting with Hiram went something like Lyle's?

name: sargasm
text: Lyle still punishes at this game.

name: tombsgrave
text: The last panel upsets me.  It sounds like certain shock site images.  Someone somewhere somehow is getting off to that thought.

name: mike24
text: that game really was all things to all people

name: dovey
text: Lyle bends Oregon Trail to his will

name: cousinted
text: Lyle does this to everything he touches.

name: songbirdspectre
text: Lyle plays a mean Oregon Trail.

name: molesticide
text: i like how digital lyle AND real lyle BOTH cackle maniacally as the vomit shoots several feet into the air and lands on his face.

name: skiddyfisk
text: Yarrrrrrrp

name: spinynorman
text: Lyle is the hero I hope to never meet.

name: rhymesforkids
text: this is my favorite strip.

name: erinye
text:
I think Lyle just won the game. I mean, actually won it, not just ended up in some boondocks place where you have to fight off bears using only a leftover wagon axle.

On that note, I just lost The Game.

name: heccibiggs
text: Yeah, so did I, dammit! I was winning for a month or so there.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Gah I have no recollection of writing this comment and it was a real shock to scroll down and see my own face looking at me.

Eeek.

name: zapatos
text: well now a tiny otter is puffing up for a hug, so... get ready for that one.

name: brinkmanship
text: Fortunately, other people losing The Game doesn't cause you to lose The Game. Instead, I expect to lose The Game sometime tomorrow morning.

name: deovalente
text: That's more like a video game version of Lyle's life.

name: emory
text: lyle is my boy

name: atmus
text: The best part is the last pannel, where Lyle has his cheek on his hand, and is laughing.  Not at ammusement over his antics in the game, but over fond rememberance of when he did this for real three nights ago.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Lyle fucking rules.

name: possums
text:
Ha ha!

>:3

name: mangtastic
text: That's so Lyle.

name: xerol
text: I believe this is the first strip where Lyle's mustache is more than a simple axehead.

name: furge
text: This is how Lyle WINS at Oregon Trail.

name: freakytiki
text: Lyle has disappointed Hyram, and in a way, this makes me feel sad.

name: th1s1sm1n3
text: Lyle will even drink digital whiskey to excess. That's hell of cool.
